patterns: What is fees of Btech course?
responses: Fees of B.Tech is approximately 2 lac per annum but Uttarakhand students get 25% discount on there fees on top of scholarships.
B.Tech fees is approximately 2 lac per annum and gives Uttarakhand students a 25% discount on there fees on top of scholarships.

patterns: How to check my student ID
Where can i check my marks
Where can i check my fees details
responses: You can go to student erp portal at 'https://student.gehu.ac.in' to check all student details.
Visit 'https://student.gehu.ac.in' to get all student details.

patterns: How many sports are in GEHU
responses: We have a basketball court, a vollyball court, a football ground, a badminton court and table tennis facilities available on university grounds.
We have  basketball, vollyball, football, badminton and table tennis facilities available in our University.

patterns: Who is the founder of graphic era

responses: Founder of GEHU is Prof. Kamal Ghansala.
Prof. Kamal Ghansala is the founder of Graphic Era.

patterns: Who are the faculties of GEHU
